original: 揚州廣陵人。師從東漢末年名醫華陀，依華陀養生之法，壽至九十餘仍耳目聰明，齒牙完堅。吳普亦編撰有數部醫書，但皆已亡佚。
text: People from Guangling, Yangzhou. Under the tutelage of the famous doctor Hua Tuo in the late Eastern Han Dynasty, according to Hua Tuo's health maintenance method, he was still clever in his eyes, eyes and ears, with strong teeth and teeth. Wu Pu also compiled several medical books, but all of them have died.
